events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will review it promptly.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department focusing on backend software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate's recruitment process.
Initial screening was conducted successfully, highlighting the candidateâ€™s experience with cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
The candidate responded positively to the preliminary questions and expressed enthusiasm about the role and company culture.
We have scheduled a technical interview with the candidate for May 16th to evaluate their coding and system design skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating strong proficiency in backend development and problem-solving.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 19th to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
HR interview was completed with positive feedback; the candidate aligns well with the company values and culture.
An offer letter has been proposed to the candidate including details on salary, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and is currently reviewing the terms carefully.
The candidate has accepted the offer officially and expressed excitement to join our engineering team.
The onboarding process has started successfully, with the candidate completing initial documentation and orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now closed; the candidate has been fully integrated into the engineering team and started contributing.
